ENGLISH: The Low Germans have for a long time been treated as secondary citizens and slaves by the Sorbian upper class. While they surely deserve it the bohemian aristocracy has always had a distaste for it, thusly our only alternative is to end the barbaric practice and try to integrate the now free slaves into civilized society.
The southgerman states have had it too good for too long! They ignore all our laws and edicts and just drink beer all day! We must end this with massive amounts of violence!!!

The Rhenish have evaded our rule with the help of the scheming burgundians. After our recent ascenion however they can ignore us no longer, and we are finally able to integrate the rhineland into the Holy Slavic Empire, like it should be!
